title: The Doll's house. - Edited version
creator_credit: Patrick Garland, Hillard Elkins and Paramount Communications
brief_description: An edited version of the feature film based on Ibsen’s feminist play of the same name. Set in the 1890’s, it concerns a woman’s attempt to find a role in society for herself apart from those of wife and mother. Stars Claire Bloom, Anthony Hopkins, Denholm Elliott, Anna Massey.
creator_credit_for_label: Patrick Garland, Hillard Elkins and Paramount Communications
